title: Rurouni Kenshin: Trust and Betrayal
fullTitle: Rurouni Kenshin: Trust and Betrayal (TV Series 1999â€“1999)

episodes.title: Kiru Otoko
episodes.plot: Episode of how Kenshin came under the wing of Soujiro Hiko the 13th, how he was trained and how he became a manslayer.

episodes.title: Mayoi Neko
episodes.plot: The second episode details Kenshin's role in the revolution, how he met Tomoe, and how the rebellion was almost quelled.

episodes.title: Yoi no Satoyama
episodes.plot: The third episode details how Kenshin lived with Tomoe and married her as a cover until his side replenished its forces to continue the rebellion.

episodes.title: Juuji Kizu
episodes.plot: The fourth episode is about the betrayal against Kenshin, how he lived for the next few years as a manslayer, and the origin of his cross-shaped scar.
